org.openjdk.tools.javac.main

类 Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openjdk.tools.javac.main.Main

  • public class Main
extends Object
    This class provides a command line interface to the javac compiler.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

        Construct a compiler instance.

      • Main

        public Main(String name,
            PrintWriter out)
        Construct a compiler instance.
        参数:
        name - the name of this tool
        out - a stream to which to write messages

      • Main

        public Main(String name,
            PrintWriter out,
            PrintWriter err)
        Construct a compiler instance.
        参数:
        name - the name of this tool
        out - a stream to which to write expected output
        err - a stream to which to write diagnostic output

    • 方法详细资料

      • compile

        public Main.Result compile(String[] args)
        Programmatic interface for main function.
        参数:
        args - the command line parameters
        返回:
        the result of the compilation

      • compile

        public Main.Result compile(String[] argv,
                           Context context)
        Internal version of compile, allowing context to be provided. Note that the context needs to have a file manager set up.
        参数:
        argv - the command line parameters
        context - the context
        返回:
        the result of the compilation
